name: Somnus
description:
Somnus is an enthralling dungeon crawler game that takes players on a perilous adventure through a vast underground maze. The game features an ancient evil that poisons life deep underground, and players must embark on a quest to destroy this evil force.

As players venture through the game's numerous levels, they will encounter various enemies and obstacles that they must overcome to progress deeper into the maze. From intricate mazes to challenging boss battles, Somnus is designed to offer players a thrilling and difficult experience that will keep them entertained for hours.

One of the unique features of Somnus is the permadeath feature, which means that if players die, they must start all over again. This feature adds an extra layer of difficulty to the game and encourages players to be strategic and cautious in their approach.

Another key feature of Somnus is its roguelike elements, where the layout of the dungeon and items are randomized each time players play the game. This means that players will never have the same experience twice, keeping the game fresh and exciting even after multiple playthroughs.

Other key features of Somnus include a variety of weapons, equipment, and upgrades to help players on their journey, secret rooms and hidden treasures to discover, an engaging storyline and lore, and an immersive soundtrack and sound effects that enhance the overall gaming experience.

In conclusion, Somnus is a must-play game for fans of dungeon crawler and action games who crave a challenging and immersive experience. With its unique features and engaging gameplay, Somnus promises hours of fun and excitement for players of all skill levels.

Key features:

  • Cool pixel art
  • Various enemies and obstacles
  • Permadeath feature
  • Roguelike elements
  • Array of weapons, equipment, and upgrades
  • Secret rooms and hidden treasures
  • Engaging storyline and lore
  • Immersive soundtrack and sound effects
